ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(AdditionalChargeCreditAmount__c < 0,OR($Profile.Name = "FSP - SAM + RC",$Profile.Name = "FSP - Sam Lead",$Profile.Name = "FSP - SAM+",$Profile.Name = "FSP - SAM++",$Profile.Name = "FSP - SAMs"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The price must be greater than or equal to 0
